title: 501 on Main
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Italian, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fine dining atmosphere with dinner prices $20+ per dish. Veg choices include ratatouille, risotto, vegan curry with oven-roasted carrots and potatoes, vegan soy chicken, caramelized onion and mushroom in a creamy braise of yellow curry, and blended cashew slivers and coconut milk on a bed of vegan vegetable risotto served in a potato crisp basket. The appetizers are not vegan.
